casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted.

No. 455. Automatic Radio Manufacturing Co., Inc. v. Hazeltine Research, Inc. Floyd H. Crews and George K. Woodworth for petitioner. Miles D. Pillars, Philip F. LaFollette, Leonard A. Watson and Laurence B. Dodds for respondent. Solicitor General Perlman filed a brief for the United States, as amicus curiae, supporting the petition.

C. A. 1st Cir. Certiorari granted.
